AddClassChooseIconTooltip: Pick a class emoji that you like! It will be shown to your subscribers
AddClassClassCodeTooltip: Class code is requested when students or parents join this class. It is generated for you but you can rename it if you want to. No space please.
AddClassClassNameTooltip: The class name is displayed to everyone who joins. Choose a 'user friendly' name e.g 'math y6'

Admin.AbsenceRequestNotApproved: Excuse message received by parent but not yet acknowledged by the school
Admin.AbsenceAddSuccess: Absence record was added successfully, parents have been notified
Admin.AbsentLateNoNotice: Absent/late not excused yet by parents
Admin.AddedToCurrentGroup: has been added to current group
Admin.AddNewClasses: You may add new classes to your school by filling in the form below.
Admin.AddNewDistList: You may add new distribution lists to your school by filling in the form below.
Admin.AddNewsgroupFillingForm: You may add new newsgroup to your school by filling in the form below.
Admin.AddnewRSSfeed: You may add new RSS feeds and link it to your newsgroup.
Admin.AdminSearchInput: Type the admin's name you want to add
Admin.AllFieldsOptional: Note: All other fields are optional including Password, which allows you to pre-set a student's password. Required fields are highlighted in
Admin.AllParentRecord: All fields after Student E-mail belong to a parent record.
Admin.CSVUploaded: Once your CSV file has been uploaded, you will be able to confirm the parent information before importing.
Admin.ClassroomExplanation: Required fields for all students. E.g. Grade 4B, the classes in Grade 4A and B. Can be identical to grade.
Admin.ClickImportStudents: To get started, click on Account > Import students
Admin.CombinationLetters: Any combination of letters and numbers unique to each student.
Admin.CreateSheetListing: Create a spreadsheet listing students and parents in the format shown above.
Admin.CreateSpreadSheet: Create a spreadsheet listing students in the format shown above. Download our CSV template, and complete the columns. It is essential that the format match the template and that no mandatory columns are left out. Refer to the following guidelines for entering your student data into the spreadsheet:
Admin.CreatedParentRecord: We have created a user record for the following parents. But because they did not provide an email, please notify them manually of their usernames and passwords.
Admin.DisplayEntriesFrom: Display entries from, and including, this date
Admin.DisplayEntriesTo: Display entries to, and including, this date
Admin.DistributionListUseful: Distribution lists are useful to send information to a same group of people. They can be used in classes and/or news.
Admin.DownloadOurCSVStarted: Download our CSV template to get started.
Admin.DownloadParentCSVStarted: Download parents' CSV template to get started.
Admin.DownloadTeachersCSVStarted: Download teachers' CSV template to get started.
Admin.ExampleShownMicrosoftExcel: The example shown is from Microsoft Excel. If you are using another program, the process may differ slightly.
Admin.ExcuseMessage: Excuse message received by parent but not yet acknowledged by the school.
Admin.FillMandatoryFields: Please ensure all mandatory parent fields are filled in.
Admin.FileHeader: file with the first row being the headings.
Admin.FileHeaderEncode: file with the first row being the headings. Please also ensure that the file is encoded in UTF-8.
Admin.FillClickAddNews: Simply fill in fields and click Add News.
Admin.FilterUser: Filter by first or last name
Admin.ForExample: For example,  you have defined classes per grade. You can then reuse these lists and send to several classes at the same time instead of listing all members again.
Admin.Gradelevels: Grade levels. Required fields for all students.
Admin.ImportIncorrectFormat: The file provided for import does not fit the required format. Please check and try again.
Admin.ImportInProgress: Users are being added. You will be notified once they have been imported.
Admin.ImportUserWarningCause: Creating a user sharing an e-mail with an existing user or adding a new role to an existing user are the possible causes of the warning
Admin.LinkRSSNewsgroup: You may link a RSS feed to a newsgroup. All news will be sent to the newsgroup.
Admin.ListNameRequired: Please ensure the list name is filled in
Admin.ListSearchInput: Type the name of the distribution list you want to add
Admin.MakeLogInDetails: Please make a note of the login details now, they will not be shown again.
Admin.ManageSchoolCommunication: With this dashboard, you can manage all school communication
Admin.ManageUsersExplain: You can add users to the class as individual user or with existing distribution list
Admin.MarkedTemplate: or marked with a * in the template. We advise you to transpose the spreadsheet to help filling it. Download our CSV template to get started.
Admin.MessageSent: These are the messages for which the parent/guardian has sent as notice that the student will be late/absent. Please acknowledge these messages as soon as possible.
Admin.NewsFieldsNotFilled: Please ensure both the Title and Content fields are filled in.
Admin.NewsTitlePlaceholder: A great catchy title to capture your audience
Admin.NewsShownAgain: The news is shown to user again
Admin.NewsHiddenFromUser: The news is hidden from user
Admin.NoNewsgroupExists: To send a news, please create at least one newsgroup first
Admin.NoNewsgroupSelected: Please select at least one newsgroup
Admin.NotExcused: Absent/late not excused yet by parents.
Admin.NoUserDistList: No user in distribution list yet
Admin.OptionalClassname: Optional. classname e.g English G4B. You can list up to 10 classnames by teacher (a teacher can have several classes)
Admin.OptionalMarkXParents: Optional. Mark by "X" if you want the parents to join this class (e.g the parent of class Grade 4B). Up to 10 classes. Tip: invite parents for primary classes
Admin.OptionalMarkXStudents: Optional. Mark by "X" if you want the students to join this class (e.g the parent of class Grade 4B). Up to 10 classes. In this case, the class name in this file need to match the class name in the student file upload (Grade 4B). Tip: invite students for secondary classes
Admin.PleaseImport: Please import the user data as a
Admin.ProvideEmailOrPassword: Please provide an email or a password with at least 4 characters
Admin.RemovedFromCurrentGroup: has been removed from current group
Admin.RequiredAtLeastOne: Required, at least one. You can list up to 7 subjects taught.
Admin.RequiredGrade6Students: Required field for all Grade 6 students since the email address is also the ID used to login. If students don't have email addresses, fake email addresses can be used to allow the students access to the system.
Admin.RequiredInputFormat: Required. Please input in DD-MM-YYYY format like any other date.
Admin.RequiredOneClassroom: Required at least one. You can list up to 10 classrooms by teacher e.g. Grade 4B, the second classroom from Grade 4. Can be identical to grade.
Admin.SelectListCopyUsers: Select the distribution list(s) to copy users. For multiple selection, press Ctrl(PC) or ⌘ (Mac)
Admin.SetPasswordUser: You may manually set a password for the user. This is required if no e-mail is provided
Admin.Step1: Step 1 - Download our CSV template, and complete the columns
Admin.Step2: Step 2: Save your spreadsheet as a CSV file.
Admin.Step3Parents: Step 3: Upload your CSV file of parents
Admin.Step3Students: Step 3: Upload your CSV file of students
Admin.Step3Teachers: Step 3: Upload your CSV file of teachers and staff
Admin.StructureFile: The structure of the file is basically 1 line per teacher. The columns describes how the teacher's class(es) will be organized. Please refer to the following guidelines for entering teacher data into the spreadsheet:
Admin.StudentDobRequired: Date of Birth is required for students
Admin.StudentIDSkipped: Student ID can be skipped if Student E-mail is present, and vice versa. At least one parent or carer is mandatory.
Admin.SubscribeNewsgroupsUser: You can see existing newsgroups and users being subscribed to the newsgroups in here
Admin.TableDisplay: This table displays the student marked as late or absent by the system. It reconciles the absences with parents' notice. Please acknowledge these messages as soon as possible.
Admin.Title: Title
Admin.UpdateFail: There was an error while updating. Please try again.
Admin.UserSearchInput: Type the user's name you want to add
Admin.UserRemoveConfirmation: Do you really want to remove the selected users?
Admin.UserCannotRemoveSelf: Please deselect your own account first. You cannot remove your account
Admin.UserCannotRemoveAdminRole: You cannot remove your admin role
Admin.VerificationIssue: There was an issue with sending the emails

AdminDashboardOnBrowser: Administration dashboard only available on browser at https://now.gosmartix.com
Allow_this_class_to_be_searched: Allow this class to be searched
AnyoneInThisClassCanStartAChat: Anyone in this class can start a chat
App_tour_explain: App tour: Show me the benefits !
AskParentAndStudentToDownloadApp: Ask parents and students to download the app “Smartix” on the App Store or on Google Play
AskParentAndStudentToDownloadApp_IOS: Ask parents and students to download the app “Smartix”
CantJoinTheClassYouOwn: You can't join the class you own.
ClassAddFailed: Cannot add class, please try again
ClassCodeErrorMessage: At least 3 letters in lower case only (a-z) or digit (0-9) e.g. math123. Class name is free of choice.
ClassNameRequired: Class Name is a required field
ClassCodeRequired: Class Code is a required field
Class_code_not_available: is not available. You may try
ClassNotFound: Could not find the class with class code
EmailTaken: Sign up fail. The email is already taken
EmailSentTo: We have sent an email to
EmailToFinishRegistration: Open it to finish registration (please check also your Spam folder).
EnjoyTheApp: Go Smartix and get more engagement from students and parents!
HelpReply: You can choose how you want people to reply. Do you allow comments or votes or both?
HowSmartixExpect: How do you expect Smartix to solve them?
HowToAddMemberToYourGroup: How to add members to your group
How_would_you_like_to_add_new_members: How would you like to add new members
How_would_you_like_to_receive_notificati: How would you like to receive notification?
IWillOnlyMessagePeople13AndOlder: I will only chat with people who are 13 years old or older
InviteTeacherToLearnHowToAdd: Now you have created your first class. Learn how to invite students and parents to join your class.
Itisworkofftime: Your teacher is not available at this time. Please try later.
JoinAClassByInputClassCode: Please input a class code to join
JoinedFirstClass: Congrats! You have just joined you first class.

Newsgroups.Displaynewsgroup: All School's newsgroups are displayed here. You can opt-out some of the newsgroups by clicking out the tick. After opt-out, you will not receive any notifications and messages of those newsgroups. Not all newsgroups can be opt-out. Newsgroups already opt-out is still shown in here, so you can opt-in freely anytime later on.

No_private_note_yet: Here you can take a private note, which is not shared with the member. For example, you can write the parent's name or any other useful information
OfficeHoursExplanation: You can set office hours to manage when you can be contacted
OneLastStep: One last step and you can enjoy the app ;-)
PasswordChanged: Your password has been changed. Welcome back!
PasswordNotTheSame: Password and confirm password are not the same
PersonalDomainTaken: School domain name has been taken. Please choose another one.
PersonalDomainInvalid: School domain name entered must be alphanumeric and 4 characters or more
PersonalSignup: Sign up for an individual account
PressCtrlCorLongPressToCopy: Long press on the link to copy or Press Ctrl· C to copy
Report_subtitle: Keeping Smartix safe is our priority, but it is a shared responsibility
ResetPasswordEmailContent: __first_name__, You told us you forgot your password. If you really did, click below to choose a new one:
SendEmailInvitationsForStudentAndParentJ: Send email invitations for students and parents to join your class. This is a great way to add people you don’t see very often.
ShareThisLinkHelpsStudentsAndParentJoinY: Students and parents will be able to join your class
ShareThisLinkWithYourClass: Share this link with your class
ShowClass: Show your class how to join
SignOutFailure: We could not sign you out. Please try again.
SignOutSuccess: You have been signed out successfully
SignUpAgreeToTOSAndPP: By signing up, you agree to the
SignUpMotto2: and experience why so many schools have chosen us
SignUpMotto3: Type your school name and watch the magic
SomethingWentWrong: We are sorry but something went wrong
StartFreeTrial: Start my 30-day FREE trial of my personalised school app
StudentAndParentCanJoinByClassCode: Students and parents can join your class by typing the class code in the app or in a browser.
StudentAndParentVisitLinkToJoinClass: Students and parents can visit this link to join your class. They can copy and paste in their browser.
Thanks_for_sharing: Many thanks for giving us feedback to continuously improve our services
TheFollowingMemberWouldBeRemoved: The following member will be removed
Type_Class_Code: Class code shared with your class (modifiable)
Type_Class_Name: Type your class name e.g. 'math y6'
UnsubscribeEmailNotification: If you prefer not to receive email notification, go to Menu: You > Notification > Uncheck Email
VerifyEmailSubject: Welcome to Smartix  - Please verify your email
WeHaveAppVersion: Smartix is also available as a mobile app for your convenience. You can download it from
WelcomeVerification: Welcome to Smartix. A verification email has also sent to your account. Click it to enable more features!
Whatisyourdateofbirth: What is your date of birth?
WhichIssues: Which issues do you face the most at school?

absence.StartBeforeEnd: Start date needs to be earlier than end date

accounts-relationships.Norecord: No relationship between parent and student

addClassDescription: It's OK if students are under 13; we'll ask them their parent's email to keep everyone in the loop.

feedbackTextarea: Tell us what you think! Your feedback enables us to continuously improve our services and to make our members happy
